references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), the foundation upon which this research's architecture is built.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper introduces the Masked Autoencoder (MAE) which is referenced as inspiration for the factorized approach to image generation.

references.paper_title: GANS trained by a two time-scale update rule converge to a local Nash equilibrium
references.reason: This paper is cited for its contribution to the understanding and training of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), a related area of generative modeling.

references.paper_title: U-Net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces the U-Net architecture, a key component in the proposed architecture of this research, because of its success in image segmentation.
This paper is highly influential in the field of image segmentation, providing a strong baseline for comparison and a foundation for techniques used in this work.
